attributes.action: Prioritise people to the selected areas they choose to be housed on the council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am and have been on the council waiting list for 4 years, i am in a very complex situation but basically i keep asking for a home in my area and the only response i get is, "you must change your areas!" well i want to stay in the area i choose because my daughter is in a local school which she loves dearly, and i do not aggree with moving her school, myself and my husband live apart as i live with my parents who wont let him move in and its very distressing for my children, why should i have to move to another area of the city? and change my daughters school? how is that fair? please could everyone sign this petition and help me and my family be rehoused together in the area of our choice. Many thanks

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
